document.title: SP681-R-Weight and Body Image

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract:
You can never be too thin or be too rich! This popular phrase has been around a long time, but it sends the wrong message. You can definitely be too thin although Iâ€™m not sure about too rich part.

There is a serious gap between what is accepted as the ideal body and the way normal people look. This is true for both males and females in our society.
